#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
 
int main(){
 
    string s;
    getline(cin,s);
 
    for(int i=0;i<s.length();){
 
        cout<<s[i];
 
        if(s[i]=='a'||s[i]=='e'||s[i]=='i'||s[i]=='o'||s[i]=='u')
            i+=3;
        else
            i++;
    }
    return 0;
}
